scenes.action_text: BARTON FINK  Screenplay By Ethan Coen & Joel Coen 								FADE IN:  	ON BARTON FINK  He is a bespectacled man in his thirties, hale but somewhat bookish. He stands, tuxedoed, in the wings of a theater, looking out at the stage, listening intently to end of a performance. In the shadows beh
